alert.note: Alert for Greenbrier (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 18 at 2:00AM EST until February 18 at 1:45PM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 AM EST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of southeast West Virginia, including the following county, Greenbrier. * WHEN...Until 530 AM EST. * IMPACTS...Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 200 AM EST, Minor flooding is already occurring in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of Western Greenbrier County - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. When it is safe to do so, please send your reports of flooding, including mudslides or flooded roads, to the National Weather Service by calling toll free at 1...8 6 6...2 1 5...4 3 2 4. Reports and pictures can also be shared on the National Weather Service Blacksburg Facebook page and on Twitter.
